Title: Starvation
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Chris Provenzano, Elmore Leonard (short story "Fire in the Hole")
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Jere Burns, Joelle Carter
Plot: The marshals needs to make a deal with Boyd to take down Darrell Crowe Jr., but Dewey unexpectedly gets in the way. Meanwhile, Ava's enemies in prison begin to make their move against her.
